item.description:
Our inaugural event is finally here! Come join us for a night of film and geek talk (what is google up to these days, vista, the apple phone and more).

Everything with Warner Bros. Pictures worked out and I am holding a bunch of passes to see Firewall on the 6th of February (Monday). After the film I was thinking that it would be great to head out for a bite to eat in Chinatown right behind the theater. This way we can get to know everyone.

I will send exact meeting details as they become available.

group.name: The Boston Computing Review Meetup Group

item.name: Movie Night! Firewall
